title: Calories in 100g Berries
meta_description: Discover calories in berries 100g, including carbs, fiber, protein, fat, and full nutrition breakdown for mixed fresh berries.
assumptions: Mixed fresh berries (strawberries, blueberries, raspberries, blackberries), raw, no added sugar or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by berry type, ripeness, variety, and growing conditions. Check labels or databases for specific types.

quick_answer.text: 100g of mixed fresh berries provides ~57 kcal and ~3.6 g fiber.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.a: About 57 kcal for 100g mixed fresh berries.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in 100g berries?
faqs.a: Roughly 14.5 g total carbs, including 3.6 g fiber and 9.9 g sugars.
Yes, only 0.3 g fat per 100g, with no saturated or trans fats.
A small amount: about 1.2 g protein per 100g.

faqs.q: How does berry type affect calories?
faqs.a: Strawberries ~32 kcal/100g, blueberries ~57 kcal/100g; mixes average out.
